name: nist-control-mapper-react
description: Production-ready NIST Cybersecurity Framework Control Mapper

scripts.build: npm run client:build && npm run server:build
scripts.test: npm run client:test && npm run server:test
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install
scripts.db:migrate: cd server && npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run db:generate && npm run db:migrate && npm run db:seed

author: NIST Control Mapper Team
